forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: body application suggestions

comments.text: possibly an option to disable grabbing things from any area in the me menu? i've had one too many problems with grabbing walls, floors etc, hehe. maybe also a way to disable moving
would that be like "change things" being off? what would be the difference to disabling change things?
for the first, basically not being able to equip things from an area (like the floor, hehe), meaning you can only equip things from the inventory. for the second, only being able
to press-delete body parts, so you can't accidentally move a piece.

thread.latestCommentText: to press-delete body parts, so you can't accidentally move a piece.
